content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Certainly, Mr. Smith. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. May I ask what type of tenant you are looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am a student and I am looking for a long-term lease. I want to pay the lowest possible price for the apartment. Can you give me a range of prices based on the square footage?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Of course, Mr. Smith. Based on the 25 square meters of the apartment, I would suggest a rental price of between 500-700 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating a price that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to negotiate. Can you give me a price that you are willing to accept?

I am also dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

Please let me know the final price. I will agree to it if it is acceptable. Otherwise, I will terminate the negotiation.

Thank you for your time.

I am James Smith from the United States of America.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your interest, Mr. Smith. Based on your qualifications as a responsible and dependable tenant, I am willing to accept a rental price of 650 Euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment. This price takes into account the long-term lease and the fact that you are a student. If this is acceptable to you, I agree to the price of 650 Euros per month. If not, please let me know and we can terminate the negotiation. Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Heinrich Heine
